name: Group FMG
tag_list: media, advertising, e-commerce, digital, marketing, content, agency, creative, print, production, video, photography, rich-media, outsourcing, ldo, pto, global-marketing-solutions, design, agency-of-record, commerce-enablement
overview:
Group FMG is a global provider of high impact marketing & media solutions; a new-age agency of record that integrates creative design, production services (content & graphics) and commerce enablement. Group FMG is also focused on delivering digital transformation that fulfills marketing ROI imperatives and in building strategic long-term client relationships. Group FMG is headquartered in New York, with offices in London, Bangalore and Chennai.

Group FMG is uniquely placed to drive marketing results across industry sectors and channels through effective, agile, accelerated cross platform solutions. With key differentiators/ enablers spanning domain expertise, proprietary technology, process excellence and actionable analytics tailored precisely to meet customer needs, Group FMG offers a range of solutions, from specialty point services to fully integrated solutions and outcome based services that seamlessly integrate several niche offerings like creative services, compelling rich media content, print & graphics production & innovative e-commerce initiatives.

Group FMG has delivered successful, award-winning, world class marketing campaigns and media production services across various platforms including: print, mobile, tablets, interactive magazines, e-books, catalogues, e-commerce solutions, digital shop fronts, portals, websites, videos and loyalty programs. Global 1000 clients include, Sears, Staples, Pepsi, Boots, Harrods, Boden among retail/consumer packaged goods; Disney, Readerâ€™s Digest, Penguin, Harper Collins, BBC, Haymarket, AMI among media & publishing; IBM, Yahoo!, Microsoft, Sony among technology and Sandals among travel & hospitality.

Group FMG is funded by India Value Fund Advisors (IVFA), a leading private equity fund, and Zodius Capital, a growth capital and build-out company. The management comprises of an international team of entrepreneurial leaders with deep experience of creating large global businesses.

For more information see www.groupfmg.com.
